review: Dr. Deepu is the sweetest. As it was my first time consulting a Gyno I was nervous. But she talked me through it and explained everything very well. I would definitely recommend her.

very caring doctor, helped me very much in listening to me patiently and advised how to go about in very simple and understandable manner. Makes me look forward to my next visit to her clinic soon.

Dr Deepu had so much of patience, she heard all my problems without interrupting.  When I finished, she clarified her doubts and made diagnosis.  She told it's all related to menopause , and told me how to deal with this natural phenomena. It's all bound to happen to all ladies but varies with intensity.   *** *** * ********* *** ***py that I met her and took her advice.

The doctor was very patient and she is a very keen listener. She listens to our problem completely & discusses with us the course of medication she intends to start us on. She is not only interested in treatment but also looks to find the root cause of the problem. She believes in treating the cause to ensure the problem wouldn't repeat. 
I would definitely recommend this doctor!
*** ** *** **** **** * **** *** ** ****  Very patiently listened and gave clear and precise info advising me how to go about.   I would recommend her to all my friends and colleagues!!
